### use
```python
$ pip install cho-check-os-ver
$ python
>>> from cho_check_os_ver.hi  import hi
>>> hi()

```

### Development environment setting
```bash
# install PDM
# git clone ...
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pdm install
# $ vi ...
# TEST
$ pdm install
$ pdm test
$ pip install

# git add / commit / push
$ pdm publish
